item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a short-form content video editor for TikTok and Instagram Reels.

Our client is in the automotive industry and has significant amounts of long-form video content that we will want to create short-form video content from.

This client builds custom car headlights and has a great product we want to showcase with high-quality reels.

Experience and knowledge of the automotive industry is preferred.

Proposals without work samples will be disregarded.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 17:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
